item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 01 Feb 2022
item.description:
1. ppx_seq v0.1.1
  2. OCaml Labs Joins Tarides
  3. For Diversity and the OCaml Community: Get Involved in Outreachy Summer 2022
  4. Set up OCaml 2.0.0-beta13
  5. First release of scfg
  6. Brr 0.0.3, a toolkit for programming browsers
  7. (anonymous?) polymorphic records
  8. 2 postdoc positions on Runtime Verification at CEA LIST, Universit√© Paris-Saclay, France
